languages.text: "Спросите розу, нравится ли ей каждое утро получать поцелуи солнца. Спросите бархан, нравится ли ему чувствовать ласковые и игривые касания ветра. Спросите и услышите мой ответ, шерин".
"Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."
languages.original_text: "Спросите розу, нравится ли ей каждое утро получать поцелуи солнца. Спросите бархан, нравится ли ему чувствовать ласковые и игривые касания ветра. Спросите и услышите мой ответ, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Pregunte a la rosa si le gusta recibir los besos del sol cada mañana. Pregunte a la duna si le gustan las caricias y los toques juguetones del viento. Le darán la misma respuesta que yo, shereen».
languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Pregunte a la rosa si le gusta recibir los besos del sol cada mañana. Pregunte a la duna si le gustan las caricias y los toques juguetones del viento. Le darán la misma respuesta que yo, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “不如问问玫瑰是否喜欢每天清晨阳光的亲吻？或者问问沙丘是否享受风的爱抚？再问一次，猜猜我会怎么回答吧，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “不如问问玫瑰是否喜欢每天清晨阳光的亲吻？或者问问沙丘是否享受风的爱抚？再问一次，猜猜我会怎么回答吧，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「バラに毎朝太陽からキスされるのが好きかどうか聞いてみなよ。砂丘にも風の愛撫と、くすぐるようなタッチが好きかどうかもね。それがあたしの答えだよ、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「バラに毎朝太陽からキスされるのが好きかどうか聞いてみなよ。砂丘にも風の愛撫と、くすぐるようなタッチが好きかどうかもね。それがあたしの答えだよ、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Demandez plutôt à la rose si elle aime recevoir le baiser du soleil chaque matin. À la dune de sable si elle aime sentir les caresses espiègles du vent sur ses flancs. Posez-vous la question, shereen, et vous aurez votre réponse. »
languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Demandez plutôt à la rose si elle aime recevoir le baiser du soleil chaque matin. À la dune de sable si elle aime sentir les caresses espiègles du vent sur ses flancs. Posez-vous la question, shereen, et vous aurez votre réponse. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Fragt die Rose, ob sie es mag, jeden Morgen die Küsse der Sonne zu empfangen. Fragt die Sanddüne, ob sie es mag, die zärtlichen, verspielten Berührungen des Windes zu spüren. Fragt und vernehmt meine Antwort, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Fragt die Rose, ob sie es mag, jeden Morgen die Küsse der Sonne zu empfangen. Fragt die Sanddüne, ob sie es mag, die zärtlichen, verspielten Berührungen des Windes zu spüren. Fragt und vernehmt meine Antwort, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

languages.text: "Güle, her sabah güneşin onu öpüşünden hoşnut olup olmadığını sor. Kuma, rüzgârın onu tatlı tatlı okşamasından hoşnut olup olmadığını sor. Yanıtım bu sorularda şirinim."
languages.original_text: "Ask the rose if it likes to receive the kisses of the sun every morning. Ask the sand dune if it likes to feel the caressing and playful touch of the wind. Ask and hear my answer, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Güle, her sabah güneşin onu öpüşünden hoşnut olup olmadığını sor. Kuma, rüzgârın onu tatlı tatlı okşamasından hoşnut olup olmadığını sor. Bunları sor ve yanıtımı duyacaksın şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
